availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Russell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Bryant Flanagan and Milley French Flanagan. Married to Parkey Jane Eastham Flanagan. Father of Mary A. Flanagan and John M. Flanagan. Farmer in Russell County in 1850. Farmer in Russell County in 1860. Farmer in Russell County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, District 1, p. 214A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, District of Russell, p. 757.
